About the Company: Adani Transmission India Ltd is engaged in transmission of energy. The company has developed and commissioned 400 kilo vatt direct current dedicated Mundra-Dehgam transmission line of 430 Kms. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Ahemadabad, Gujarat. Adani Transmission India Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Adani Group.
